## Biography

Yunyi Ru is a 2nd year master's student in the Molecular Microbiology and Immunology department of [Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health](https://publichealth.jhu.edu/). 

Yunyi currently works as a graduate student researcher at [The Pekosz Lab](https://pekoszlab.com/) on ***virology***, and a research assistant at [The R3ISE Center)](https://publichealth.jhu.edu/the-r3-center-for-innovation-in-science-education) on ***responsive science communication***.
